basics.name: Basic Tutorial
basics.description: Learn the basic UI and controls of Gin7.

mapNavigation.name: Galaxy Map Navigation
mapNavigation.description: Learn the detailed features of the galaxy map.

fleetMovement.name: Fleet Movement
fleetMovement.description: Learn how to select and move fleets.

combat.name: Combat Basics
combat.description: Learn the basic concepts and how to participate in combat.

economy.name: Economy Basics
economy.description: Learn the basics of planet management and resource production.

welcome.title: Welcome to Gin7!
welcome.description: Welcome to the world of Legend of Galactic Heroes. In this tutorial, you'll learn the basic controls.

topbarIntro.title: Top Bar Introduction
topbarIntro.description: The top bar shows your character info, notifications, and game time.

cpDisplay.title: Command Points (CP)
cpDisplay.description: PCP (Personal Command Point) and MCP (Military Command Point) are the cost of actions. They regenerate over time.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Important events will be notified. Click to see details.

sidemenuIntro.title: Side Menu
sidemenuIntro.description: Quickly access main features from the left side menu.

mapMenu.title: Galaxy Map
mapMenu.description: Check star systems and planets on the galaxy map and move fleets.

mapZoom.title: Map Controls
mapZoom.description: Use mouse wheel to zoom, drag to pan. Click a star system for details.

minimapIntro.title: Minimap
minimapIntro.description: Use the minimap at bottom right to see your location and navigate quickly.

fleetMenu.title: Fleet Management
fleetMenu.description: View and manage your fleets in the fleet menu.

characterMenu.title: Character Info
characterMenu.description: Check your stats, rank, and faction in the character menu.

basicComplete.title: Basic Tutorial Complete!
basicComplete.description: Congratulations! You've learned the basics. Explore the galaxy now. More tutorials are available in the help menu.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.content: Welcome to the world of Legend of Galactic Heroes. Complete the tutorial to learn the basics.

firstMap.title: Galaxy Map Tip
firstMap.content: Use mouse wheel to zoom, drag to pan. Click a star system to see details.

firstCombat.title: First Combat!
firstCombat.content: Combat has started! Choose your formation and adjust energy allocation to gain advantage.

combatLosing.title: Combat Disadvantage
combatLosing.content: You're at a disadvantage. Consider retreating. Preserving your fleet is also a strategy.

lowResources.title: Low Resources Warning
lowResources.content: Resources are low. Build production facilities or secure resources through trade.

promotionAvailable.title: Promotion Available!
promotionAvailable.content: You have enough experience. Apply for promotion in the personnel menu.

pcp.description: Personal Command Point. Consumed for personal actions (movement, administration, diplomacy, etc.).

mcp.description: Military Command Point. Consumed for military actions (combat orders, fleet command, etc.).

command.description: Ability to command fleets. Higher command allows efficient operation of larger fleets.

combat.description: Tactical judgment and combat performance ability.

intelligence.description: Strategic thinking and intelligence analysis ability.

empire.description: An absolute monarchy ruled by the Goldenbaum Dynasty.

phezzan.description: A commercial nation maintaining neutrality between the two powers.
